script.name: wwsl.T2.signal.attacked
script.sourceplaintext:
* TODO: Switch to use combat message logging * At the moment it is a navigation log $gLogFN=596 * This is varname to mark the ship is on the Safe Point 2 $gVarSP2='wwsl.T2.attacked.isSP2' * This is varname to select a fleing phase at start. * For testing purposes only! * Possible values: * 4 - last chance * 3 - next sector * 2 - move locally * 1 - jump next $gVarInitialState='wwsl.T2.attacked.InitialPhase' * This is varname to point to a new attacker * If is set then restart of the program is needed $gVarRestartForAttacker='wwsl.T2.attacked.InitialPhase' $gVarLastDefTime='wwsl.T2.attacked.LastDefTime'
ifget task ID [THIS] ->interrupt task 0 with script wwsl.T2.signal.attacked and prio 100: arg1=$Attacker arg2=$Action arg3=null arg4=null return null end
@ $Action.Text=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=57 arg1=$Action @ $Attacker.Text=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=59 arg1=$Attacker
@ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38000 arg2=$Attacker.Text arg3=$Action.Text
if$Action == [ACTION_ENTER_GATE] OR $Action == [ACTION_JUMP] OR $Action == [ACTION_LAND_IN_STATION] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38001 arg2=$Action.Text return null end
* Skip if there is an offensive action in progress ifis script with prio 99 on stack @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38002 return null end * Skip if there is a defensive action already in progress ifis script with prio 51 on stack @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38003 return null end
ifis script with prio 50 on stack if[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarSP2 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38005 [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker value=$Attacker else gosub DEFENSIVE.ACTION end else gosub ENTER.EMERGENCY end return null
ENTER.EMERGENCY: @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38031 $orig.dest=[THIS] -> get destination $orig.cmd=[THIS] -> get command $orig.cmd.target=[THIS] -> get command target $orig.cmd.target2=[THIS] -> get command target2 $orig.dest.sector=null * Determine the destination sector if available if$orig.dest $orig.dest.sector=$orig.dest skip ifis datatype[ $orig.dest ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $orig.dest.sector=$orig.dest -> get sector end ENTER.EMERGENCY.AGAIN: gosub INITIAL.PHASE * Restore navigation parameters * They are may be changed [THIS] ->set command: $orig.cmd [THIS] ->set destination to $orig.dest [THIS] ->set command target: $orig.cmd.target [THIS] ->set command target2: $orig.cmd.target2 $r=[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker if$r [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker value=null $Attacker=$r @ $Attacker.Text=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=59 arg1=$Attacker @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38035 arg2=$Attacker.Text goto label ENTER.EMERGENCY.AGAIN end @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38032 endsub * End of ENTER.EMERGENCY
INITIAL.PHASE: set script priority to 50 $num.drones=random value from 2 to 6 - 1 gosub LAUNCH.DRONES @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38004 [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarSP2 value=null $t=[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarInitialState [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarInitialState value=null ifis datatype[ $t ] == DATATYPE_INT @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38014 arg2=$t if$t == 4 gosub LAST.CHANCE else if$t == 3 gosub NEXT.SECTOR else if$t == 2 gosub MOVE.LOCALLY else if$t == 1 gosub JUMP.NEXT else @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38015 arg2=$t end else gosub JUMP.NEXT end [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarSP2 value=null endsub * End of INITIAL.PHASE
* Try to use jumpdrive to jump to neighboring sector JUMP.NEXT: @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38033 arg2=[SECTOR] if not[THIS] -> get amount of ware Прыжковый двигатель in cargo bay @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38048 gosub MOVE.LOCALLY endsub end $r=[THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector [SECTOR] $t=[THIS] -> get amount of ware Батареи in cargo bay if$t < $r * 2 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38049 gosub MOVE.LOCALLY endsub end
* Check destination sector. if$orig.dest AND [SECTOR] != $orig.dest.sector $next.sector=get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $orig.dest.sector @ $next.sector.jgates=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=624 arg1=$next.sector arg2=1 $r=size of array $next.sector.jgates * There is maybe no route or no jumpable gates if$next.sector AND $r $t=random value from 0 to $r - 1 $next.sector.gate=$next.sector.jgates[$t] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38055 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$next.sector.gate [THIS] ->set destination to $next.sector [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR [THIS] ->set command target: $next.sector.gate [THIS] ->set command target2: null $r=[THIS] -> use jump drive: target=$next.sector.gate if$r == FLRET_WARPED @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38050 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$next.sector.gate gosub NEXT.SECTOR endsub end end end
* Was unable/not needed to jump to the next sector on route. * Try jump to any neighboring sector with jumpable gates * and numerous stations to dock @ $next.sectors=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=625 arg1=[SECTOR] $next.sectors.count=size of array $next.sectors @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38051 arg2=$next.sectors.count $next.sectors.jgates=array alloc: size=0 $next.sectors.num.stations=array alloc: size=0 $r=0 while$r < $next.sectors.count $next.sector=$next.sectors[$r] @ $next.sector.jgates=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=624 arg1=$next.sector arg2=1 ifsize of array $next.sector.jgates @ $t=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=519 arg1=[THIS] arg2=$next.sector $t=size of array $t append $next.sector.jgates to array $next.sectors.jgates append $t to array $next.sectors.num.stations @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38052 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$t end inc $r= end $r=sort array: data=$next.sectors.jgates sort values=$next.sectors.num.stations $t=size of array $r * Found at least one sector with jumpable gates if$t dec $t= $next.sector.jgates=$r[$t] $t=size of array $next.sector.jgates $t=random value from 0 to $t - 1 $next.sector.gate=$next.sector.jgates[$t] $next.sector=$next.sector.gate -> get sector @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38055 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$next.sector.gate [THIS] ->set destination to $next.sector [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR [THIS] ->set command target: $next.sector.gate [THIS] ->set command target2: null $r=[THIS] -> use jump drive: target=$next.sector.gate if$r == FLRET_WARPED @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38053 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$next.sector.gate gosub NEXT.SECTOR endsub end end
* Was unable to jump @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38054 gosub MOVE.LOCALLY endsub * End of JUMP.NEXT
* Try to move to station or enter to the gate depends on distance MOVE.LOCALLY: @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38034 arg2=[SECTOR] @ $nearest.gate=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=517 arg1=[THIS] @ $nearest.station=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=520 arg1=[THIS] if$nearest.gate == null AND $nearest.station == null @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38042 gosub LAST.CHANCE endsub end $nearest.objects=array alloc: size=0 $nearest.objects.dist=array alloc: size=0 do if $nearest.gate append $nearest.gate to array $nearest.objects do if $nearest.station append $nearest.station to array $nearest.objects @ $nearest.objects=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=518 arg1=[THIS] arg2=$nearest.objects arg3=$nearest.objects.dist * Launch drones if nearest object is more than 4km far $c1=$nearest.objects.dist[0] if$c1 >= 4 $num.drones=random value from 3 to 7 - 1 gosub LAUNCH.DRONES end * Log found objects $t=$nearest.objects[0] $r=size of array $nearest.objects if$r == 1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38046 arg2=$t arg3=$c1 else $r=$nearest.objects[1] $c2=$nearest.objects.dist[1] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38047 arg2=$t arg3=$c1 arg4=$r arg5=$c2 end
* Check the gate is nearest. Then try to hide in the next sector if$t == $nearest.gate $next.sector=$nearest.gate get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] [THIS] ->set destination to $next.sector [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MOVE_SECTOR [THIS] ->set command target: $next.sector [THIS] ->set command target2: null while[SECTOR] != $next.sector $r=get distance between [THIS] and $nearest.gate @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38040 arg2=$next.sector arg3=$nearest.gate arg4=$r @ =[THIS] -> fly to sector $next.sector if not$nearest.gate -> exists @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38043 arg2=$next.sector gosub LAST.CHANCE endsub end end gosub NEXT.SECTOR endsub end
* The station is nearest. Try to hide in it [THIS] ->set destination to $nearest.station [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_DOCKAT [THIS] ->set command target: $nearest.station [THIS] ->set command target2: null while[DOCKEDAT] != $nearest.station $r=get distance between [THIS] and $nearest.station @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38041 arg2=$nearest.station arg3=$r @ =[THIS] -> fly to station $nearest.station if not$nearest.station -> exists @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38044 gosub LAST.CHANCE endsub end end @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38045 arg2=$nearest.station [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_IDLE [THIS] ->set command target: null [THIS] ->set command target2: null gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE while not$attacker.is.gone @ =wait randomly from 60000 to 120000 ms gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE end endsub * End of MOVE.LOCALLY
* Try to continue the route, hide at SP1 or SP2 NEXT.SECTOR: @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38017 arg2=[SECTOR] gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE do if $attacker.is.gone endsub * Check arrived to destination if$orig.dest AND $orig.dest.sector == [SECTOR] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38018 arg2=$orig.dest.sector endsub end
* Check we're on the route if$orig.dest $next.sector.gate=get next gate on route from [SECTOR] to $orig.dest.sector $next.sector=$next.sector.gate get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] $attacker.sector=$Attacker -> get sector * We're safe if the next sector on the route is not where attacker is * and if the attacker is not in current sector. if[SECTOR] != $attacker.sector AND $next.sector != $attacker.sector @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38020 arg2=$attacker.sector endsub end end
* We're not on the route * Try to get hideout on SP1 or SP2 * Try to find SP1 first @ $SP1=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=520 arg1=[THIS] if$SP1 $SP1.dist=get distance between [THIS] and $SP1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38021 arg2=$SP1 arg3=$SP1.dist [THIS] ->set destination to $SP1 [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_DOCKAT [THIS] ->set command target: $SP1 [THIS] ->set command target2: null while$SP1 -> exists $SP1.dist=get distance between [THIS] and $SP1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38022 arg2=$SP1 arg3=$SP1.dist @ =[THIS] -> fly to station $SP1 do if [DOCKEDAT] == $SP1 break end if[DOCKEDAT] != $SP1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38023 gosub LAST.CHANCE endsub end * We're docked at SP1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38030 arg2=$SP1 [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_IDLE [THIS] ->set command target: null [THIS] ->set command target2: null gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE while not$attacker.is.gone @ =wait randomly from 60000 to 120000 ms gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE end endsub end
* If we're here then SP1 not available * Move to SP2 and wait $SP2.gate=find gate: flags=[Find.Nearest], refobj=[THIS], max dist=100000, refpos=null if not$SP2.gate @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38026 gosub LAST.CHANCE endsub end [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarSP2 value=[TRUE] $SP2.gate.coords=$SP2.gate -> get position as array @ $SP2.coords=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=58 arg1=$SP2.gate.coords arg2=null arg3=60000 $SP2.x=$SP2.coords[0] $SP2.y=$SP2.coords[1] $SP2.z=$SP2.coords[2] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38027 arg2=[SECTOR] arg3=$SP2.x arg4=$SP2.y arg5=$SP2.z [THIS] ->set destination to [SECTOR] [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MOVE_COORDS [THIS] ->set command target: [SECTOR] [THIS] ->set command target2: null while$Attacker -> exists $SP2.dist=[THIS] -> get distance to: position array=$SP2.coords @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38029 arg2=$SP2.x arg3=$SP2.y arg4=$SP2.z arg5=$SP2.dist @ =[THIS] -> move to position: x=$SP2.x y=$SP2.y z=$SP2.z with precision 500 m $SP2.dist=[THIS] -> get distance to: position array=$SP2.coords if[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38036 endsub end do if $SP2.dist <= 500 break end @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38028 arg2=[SECTOR] arg3=$SP2.x arg4=$SP2.y arg5=$SP2.z [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_IDLE [THIS] ->set command target: null [THIS] ->set command target2: null gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE while not$attacker.is.gone @ =wait randomly from 60000 to 120000 ms if[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38036 endsub end gosub CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE end endsub * End of NEXT.SECTOR
* Should only be called from the retrying signal handler! DEFENSIVE.ACTION: set script priority to 51 * TODO: can fire Mosquito missile if attacker is a small ship * TODO: can analyze attacker speed and range $c1=[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarLastDefTime $c2=playing time $t=$c2 - $c1 if$c1 AND $t < 15 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38037 arg2=$t endsub end [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarLastDefTime value=$c2 $num.drones=random value from 1 to 3 - 1 gosub LAUNCH.DRONES *skip if[THIS] -> is in active sector *endsub $r=random value from 60 to 95 - 1 $t=random value from 5000 to 10000 - 1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38006 arg2=$Attacker.Text arg3=$r arg4=$t @ =[THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=$r, timeout=$tms, avoid object=$Attacker endsub * End of DEFENSIVE.ACTION
* Launch specified amount of drones to protect the ship * In: num.drones * Out: num.drones.launched LAUNCH.DRONES: $c1=[THIS] -> get amount of ware Боевой дрон in cargo bay $c2=[THIS] -> get amount of ware Боевой Дрон MKII in cargo bay $t=$c1 + $c2 $r=[THIS] -> launch $num.drones fight drones: protect me or attack target=null $c1=[THIS] -> get amount of ware Боевой дрон in cargo bay $c2=[THIS] -> get amount of ware Боевой Дрон MKII in cargo bay $num.drones.launched=$t - $c1 - $c2 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38008 arg2=$num.drones.launched endsub * End of LAUNCH.DRONES
LAST.CHANCE: @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38007 $num.drones=random value from 5 to 11 - 1 [THIS] ->set destination to [SECTOR] [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_RETREAT [THIS] ->set command target: [SECTOR] [THIS] ->set command target2: null gosub LAUNCH.DRONES while$Attacker -> exists if not$Attacker -> is in same sector as [THIS] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38016 arg2=$Attacker.Text arg3=[SECTOR] break end $r=get distance between [THIS] and $Attacker if$r < 60000 [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarSP2 value=null $t=random value from 30000 to 60000 - 1 @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38009 arg2=$r @ =[THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=0, timeout=$tms, avoid object=$Attacker else [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$gVarSP2 value=[TRUE] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38038 arg2=$r @ =wait randomly from 20000 to 40000 ms if[THIS] -> get local variable: name=$gVarRestartForAttacker @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38039 endsub end end end @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38010 arg2=$Attacker.Text * TODO: There is the case when we was saved thanks last chance! * Very interesting message may be sent here endsub * End of LAST.CHANCE
* Wait until attacker will be destroyed or will be far away * In: $Attacker * Out: $attacker.is.gone - TRUE or FALSE CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE: $attacker.is.gone=[FALSE] if not$Attacker -> exists $attacker.is.gone=[TRUE] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38019 endsub end $attacker.sector=$Attacker -> get sector if$attacker.sector == [SECTOR] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38024 arg2=[SECTOR] endsub end @ $neighbor.sectors=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=625 arg1=[SECTOR] iffind $attacker.sector in array: $neighbor.sectors @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38025 arg2=$attacker.sector endsub end $attacker.is.gone=[TRUE] @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=38019 endsub * End of CHECK.ATTACKER.IS.GONE
return null

comment.var: TODO: Switch to use combat message logging
At the moment it is a navigation log
This is varname to mark the ship is on the Safe Point 2
This is varname to select a fleing phase at start.
This is varname to point to a new attacker
If is set then restart of the program is needed
Skip if there is an offensive action in progress
Skip if there is a defensive action already in progress
Determine the destination sector if available
Try to use jumpdrive to jump to neighboring sector

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector
get next sector on route from sector

comment.var: There is maybe no route or no jumpable gates
Was unable/not needed to jump to the next sector on route.
Try jump to any neighboring sector with jumpable gates
Found at least one sector with jumpable gates
Try to move to station or enter to the gate depends on distance
Launch drones if nearest object is more than 4km far
Check the gate is nearest. Then try to hide in the next sector
The station is nearest. Try to hide in it
Try to continue the route, hide at SP1 or SP2

line.text: get next gate on route from

comment.var: We're safe if the next sector on the route is not where attacker is
and if the attacker is not in current sector.
Try to get hideout on SP1 or SP2
If we're here then SP1 not available
Should only be called from the retrying signal handler!
TODO: can fire Mosquito missile if attacker is a small ship
TODO: can analyze attacker speed and range
Launch specified amount of drones to protect the ship

line.text: fight drones: protect me or attack target=

comment.var: TODO: There is the case when we was saved thanks last chance!
Very interesting message may be sent here
Wait until attacker will be destroyed or will be far away
